
AlphaPeel -geno_file simple_genotype.txt \
          -ped_file simple_pedigree.txt \
          -x_chr \
          -geno -hap -geno_prob -phased_geno_prob -seg_prob \
          -out_file simple_output

Assumed/true haplotypes used to generate the genotypes below
